sentences.sentence: B oast about the good things they tell me.
sentences.translation: 夸赞孩子告诉我们的每一件好事。

sentences.sentence: Lithium-calcium base grease, prepared by adding calcium soap into lithium base grease, can retain the multifunction of lithium base grease, reduce tie oast and improve the water resistance property.
sentences.translation: 锂基润滑脂中加入钙皂制成的锂一钙基脂，能保持锂基脂的性能，并降低成本，提高其抗水性。
